entry.title: Smart companies care about data backups early on in their business
entry.summary: Data backups are important and you should care about them early on before it becomes a problem, it's inevitable that you will experience data loss at some point but it doesn't have to always be that way.

entry.title: 10 actionable SEO improvements for every startup
entry.summary: Quick and actionable SEO improvements for every startup. SEO can be easy to improve when to understand the basics. What I learnt with my business and search ranking.

entry.title: Why an MVP is so important for startups and new businesses
entry.summary: Why an MVP (Minimal Viable Product) is so important during the early stages of a startup or business
